name: Azumarill
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you play Azumarill from your hand to evolve 1 of your Active Pokemon, you may use this power. Each Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin for each Water Energy attached to Azumarill. This attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Dark Ampharos
AbilityText: As long as Dark Ampharos is in play, whenever your opponent plays an Evolution card from his or her hand to evolve 1 of his or her Pokemon, put 2 damage counters on that Pokemon. You can't use more than 1 Darkest Impulse Poke-Body each turn.
Attack2Text: Discard all Lightning Energy attached to Dark Ampharos.

name: Dark Crobat
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Dark Crobat is your Active Pokemon, you may choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon. That Pokemon is now Poisoned. This power can't be used if Dark Crobat is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Remove from Dark Crobat a number of damage counters equal to the number of your opponent's Pokemon in play.
Attack2Text: Does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Dark Electrode
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Dark Electrode has no Energy attached to it, you may search your deck for a Darkness or Dark Metal Energy and attach it to Dark Electrode. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Dark Electrode is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: You may move all Energy cards attached to Dark Electrode to your Benched Pokemon in any way you like.

name: Dark Houndoom
Attack1Text: Choose a card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.
Attack2Text: You may discard a Fire Energy or Darkness Energy attached to Dark Houndoom. If you do, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Dark Hypno
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose an attack on 1 of your Pokemon in play that has Dark in its name (excluding this one). Dark Link copies that attack except for its Energy cost. (You must still do anything else required for that attack.) (No matter what type that Pokemon is, Dark Hypno's type is still Psychic Darkness.) Dark Hypno performs that attack.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage times the number of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.

name: Dark Marowak
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard a Basic Pokemon or Evolution card from your hand or this attack does nothing.

name: Dark Octillery
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to each Defending Pokemon. Flip a coin. If heads, each Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Dark Octillery but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

name: Dark Slowking
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top card of your opponent's deck. Then, you may shuffle his or her deck. This power can't be used if Dark Slowking is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: You may discard a combination of up to 2 Pokemon Tool cards and Rocket's Secret Machine cards from your hand. If you do, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage for each card you discarded.

name: Dark Steelix
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for an Energy card and attach it to Dark Steelix.

name: Jumpluff
AbilityText: If Jumpluff would be Knocked Out by an opponent's attack, flip a coin. If heads, Jumpluff is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP becomes 10 instead.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokemon.

name: Kingdra
AbilityText: As long as Kingdra is in play, each of your Active Pokemon has no Weakness.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage is not affected by Resistance.

name: Piloswine
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, each Defending Pokemon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: You may do 60 damage plus 40 more damage. If you do, Piloswine does 30 damage to itself.

name: Togetic
AbilityText: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Togetic by your opponent's Pokemon that has Dark in its name.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon's attacks. Rainbow Moves copies that attack except for its Energy cost. (You must still do anything else required for that attack.) (No matter what type that Pokemon is, Togetic's type is still Colorless.) Togetic performs that attack.

name: Dark Dragonite
AbilityText: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Darkness Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokemon to another of your Pokemon. This power can't be used if Dark Dragonite is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Does 30 damage to each Defending Pokemon.

name: Dark Muk
AbilityText: As long as Dark Muk is your Active Pokemon, your opponent pays ColorlessColorless more to retreat his or her Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage times the number of Colorless Energy in the Defending Pokemon's Retreat Cost (after applying effects to the Retreat Cost).
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned and Poisoned.

name: Dark Raticate
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn. Put 5 damage counters on the Defending Pokemon at the end of your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Dark Sandslash
AbilityText: If Dark Sandslash is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Dark Sandslash is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Dark Tyranitar
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Dark Tyranitar.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Dark Tyranitar
AbilityText: As long as Dark Tyranitar is your Active Pokemon, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Benched Basic Pokemon between turns. You can't use more than 1 Sand Damage Poke-Body between turns.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon already has at least 2 damage counters on it, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Delibird
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Delibird is your Active Pokemon, you may shuffle 1 card from your hand into your deck. Then, draw a card. This power can't be used if Delibird is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. If 1 of them is heads, put 4 damage counters on the Defending Pokemon. If 2 of them are heads, remove 1 damage counter from the Defending Pokemon. If all of them are heads, put 10 damage counters on the Defending Pokemon. If all of them are tails, remove all damage counters from the Defending Pokemon.

name: Furret
Attack1Text: Choose up to 3 cards in your hand and put them on top of your deck. Then, search your deck for that many cards and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Before doing damage, you may flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 80 damage instead. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Ledian
AbilityText: Any damage done to Ledian by attacks from Pokemon that has an owner in its name is reduced by 40.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Magby
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Magmar from your hand onto Magby (this counts as evolving Magby), and remove all damage counters from Magby.
Attack1Text: If you have a Supporter card in play, use the effect on that card as the effect of this attack.

name: Misdreavus
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Misdreavus is your Active Pokemon, you may flip a coin. If heads, put 1 damage counter on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This power can't be used if Misdreavus is affected by a Special Condition or if your other Active Pokemon is not Misdreavus.
Attack1Text: Switch Misdreavus with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Quagsire
AbilityText: When you attach a Water Energy card from your hand to Quagsire, remove all Special Conditions and 2 damage counters from Quagsire.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each basic Energy card attached to Quagsire but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 60 damage in this way.

name: Qwilfish
AbilityText: If Qwilfish is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Qwilfish is Knocked Out), flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, put 1 damage counter on the Attacking Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

name: Yanma
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 4 different types of basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Dark Arbok
Attack1Text: Before doing damage, count the remaining HP of the Defending Pokemon and Dark Arbok. If the Defending Pokemon has fewer remaining HP than Dark Arbok's, this attack does 10 damage plus 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is Pokemon-ex, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep and Poisoned.

name: Dark Ariados
Attack1Text: Each Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage for each Colorless Energy in that Pokemon's Retreat Cost (after applying effects to the Retreat Cost). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Dark Dragonair
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Dark Dragonair is your Active Pokemon, you may search your deck for an Evolution card. Show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Dark Dragonair is affected by a Special Condition.

name: Dark Dragonair
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage to each Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Dark Flaaffy
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon is a Basic Pokemon, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed. Dark Flaaffy can't use Thunder Slash during your next turn.

name: Dark Golbat
Attack1Text: Does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. Dark Golbat can't attack during your next turn. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Dark Golduck
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to each of your Active Pokemon during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: You may discard an Energy card attached to Dark Golduck. If you do, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Dark Gyarados
AbilityText: If Dark Gyarados is your Active Pokemon and is Knocked Out by an opponent's attack, put 3 damage counters on the Attacking Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, each Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Dark Houndoom
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Dark Houndoom is your Active Pokemon, you may flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon (choose 1 if there are 2) is now Burned. This power can't be used if Dark Houndoom is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: If you have less Benched Pokemon than your opponent, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Dark Magcargo
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each basic Energy card attached to all of your Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Dark Magneton
Attack1Text: If your opponent has at least 2 Pokemon in play, move a basic Energy card from the Defending Pokemon to another of your opponent's Pokemon.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Dark Pupitar
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.) Then, search your deck for a card that evolves from Dark Pupitar and put it on Dark Pupitar. (This counts as evolving Dark Pupitar.) Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage to each Defending Pokemon.

name: Dark Pupitar
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, each Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage is not affected by Resistance.

name: Dark Weezing
AbilityText: As long as Dark Weezing is your Active Pokemon, put 1 damage counter on each Pokemon that remains Poisoned between turns.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: Put 2 damage counters on Dark Weezing.

name: Heracross
AbilityText: Any damage done to Heracross by attacks from your opponent's Basic Pokemon is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: If you have more Prize cards left than your opponent, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Prize card more than your opponent.

name: Magmar
Attack1Text: Discard up to 2 Energy cards from your hand. Then, draw 2 cards for each Energy card you discarded.

name: Mantine
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may remove 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokemon (excluding Mantine). This power can't be used if Mantine is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Mantine can't attack during your next turn.

name: Rocket's Meowth
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Pokemon Tool card or Rocket's Secret Machine card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. If you do, you may switch Rocket's Meowth with 1 of your Benched Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin for each Pokemon in play (both yours and your opponent's). This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads. Rocket's Meowth does 10 damage times the number of tails to itself.

name: Rocket's Wobbuffet
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for Pokemon Tool cards and Rocket's Secret Machine cards. You may show either 1 Pokemon Tool card or Rocket's Secret Machine card to your opponent and put it into your hand, or show a combination of 3 Pokemon Tool cards or Rocket's Secret Machine cards to your opponent and shuffle them into your deck.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. That Pokemon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.

name: Seadra
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Move 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. If your opponent has no Benched Pokemon, this effect does nothing.

name: Skiploom
AbilityText: If Skiploom would be Knocked Out by an opponent's attack, flip a coin. If heads, Skiploom is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP becomes 10 instead.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 Special Condition. The Defending Pokemon is now affected by that Special Condition.

name: Togepi
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. Mini-Metronome copies that attack except for its Energy cost. (You must still do anything else required for that attack.) (No matter what type that Pokemon is, Togepi's type is still Colorless.) Togepi performs that attack.

name: Cubone
Attack1Text: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Basic Pokemon. Show that card to your opponent and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other revealed cards into your deck. (If you don't reveal a Basic Pokemon, shuffle all the revealed cards back into your deck.)
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Dratini
Attack1Text: Each Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Drowzee
AbilityText: Drowzee can't be Asleep.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, each Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Ekans
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Grimer
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon and switch it with 1 of the Defending Pokemon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokemon to switch.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Hoppip
AbilityText: If Hoppip would be Knocked Out by an opponent's attack, flip a coin. If heads, Hoppip is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP becomes 10 instead.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 Special Condition. The Defending Pokemon is now affected by that Special Condition.

name: Horsea
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for up to 2 Water Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Houndour
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

name: Houndour
AbilityText: If Houndour has any Darkness Energy attached to it, the Retreat Cost for Houndour is 0.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Koffing
AbilityText: If Koffing is your Active Pokemon and is Knocked Out by an opponent's attack, the Attacking Pokemon is now Confused and Poisoned.

name: Larvitar
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Larvitar
Attack2Text: Remove 1 damage counter from Larvitar.

name: Ledyba
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Grass Basic Pokemon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Magikarp
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokemon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Magnemite
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

name: Mareep
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Marill
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Onix
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Onix by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Psyduck
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can't play a Trainer card from his or her hand until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Rattata
AbilityText: As long as your opponent has any Pokemon-ex as his or her Active Pokemon, the Retreat Cost for Rattata is 0.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Rattata
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to the Defending Pokemon. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Remoraid
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to Remoraid. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Sandshrew
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Sentret
Attack1Text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Choose a Basic Pokemon or Evolution card you find there, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Put the other 4 cards back on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Slowpoke
AbilityText: Any damage done to Slowpoke by attacks from your opponent's Evolved Pokemon is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Slugma
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.
Attack2Text: Slugma does 10 damage to itself.

name: Spinarak
Attack1Text: Draw a card.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Swinub
Attack2Text: Remove all Special Conditions and all damage counters from Swinub. Swinub is now Asleep.

name: Voltorb
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy card attached to Voltorb. The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Wooper
AbilityText: When you attach a Water Energy card from your hand to Wooper, remove all Special Conditions and 1 damage counter from Wooper.

name: Zubat
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, each Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.
